original_text: I have used sackcloth to make my clothes. 16: Sackcloth was not comfortable to wear. People wore sackcloth to show that they were very sad and upset. I am no longer proud of my strength, and I sit in the dust. I have used sackcloth to make my clothes.
korean_text: 내가 굵은 베를 꿰매어 내 피부에 덮고 내 뿔을 티끌에 더럽혔구나

sentences.original_text: I have used sackcloth to make my clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 옷을 만들기 위해 베옷을 사용했다

sentences.original_text: Sackcloth was not comfortable to wear
People wore sackcloth to show that they were very sad
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 매우 슬프다는 것을 보여주기 위해 베옷을 입었다

sentences.original_text: I am no longer proud of my strength
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 내 힘을 자랑스러워하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: and I sit in the dust
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 먼지 속에 앉아 있다

sentences.original_text: I have used sackcloth to make my clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 옷을 만들기 위해 베옷을 사용했다
